message:
Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'expr' as follows:
type expr =
  | Unary_expr of un_op * expr 
  | Bin_expr of bin_op * expr * expr 
  | Const of values 
  | Type of types [@ocaml.doc " sizeof(int) "]
  | Func_call of name * expr list
  [@ocaml.doc " factorial(1, 2 + 3, 5 > 7) "]
  | Var_name of name [@ocaml.doc " return <var_name>"]
  | Cast of types * expr [@ocaml.doc " (int) a "]
  | Index of expr * expr
  [@ocaml.doc " a[1][2] => Index(Index(Var_name(a), 1), 2) "]
  | Array_value of expr list [@@deriving show { with_path = false }]

Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'prog' as follows:
type prog =
  | My_programm of prog list 
  | Func_def of prog * statement 
  | Func_decl of types * name * arg list 
  | Top_var_decl of types * name * statement option [@@deriving
                                                      show
                                                        { with_path = false }]
